Package org.jungrapht.visualization.control

Class LensVertexSelectingGraphMousePlugin<V,​E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jungrapht.visualization.control.AbstractGraphMousePlugin
      • org.jungrapht.visualization.control.VertexSelectingGraphMousePlugin<V,​E>
        • org.jungrapht.visualization.control.LensVertexSelectingGraphMousePlugin<V,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - vertex type
    E - edge type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener, GraphMousePlugin
    public class LensVertexSelectingGraphMousePlugin<V,​E>
extends VertexSelectingGraphMousePlugin<V,​E>
    A subclass of SelectingGraphMousePlugin that contains methods that are overridden to account for the Lens effects that are in the view projection
    Author:
    Tom Nelson

      • transform

        protected Shape transform​(VisualizationViewer<V,​E> vv,
                          Shape shape)
        Overridden to perform lens effects when transforming from Layout to view. Used when projecting the selection Lens (the rectangular area drawn with the mouse) back into the view.
